name: Charizard
author: Daisuke Ito
flavor_text: It is said that CHARIZARD’s fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.

poke_body.name: Fury Blaze
poke_body.effect: If your opponent has 3 or less Prize cards left, each of Charizard’s attacks does 50 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Blast Burn
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard. If tails, discard 4 Energy cards attached to Charizard. (If you can’t, this attack does nothing.)
